long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At SpeechBuddy we believe the key to learning is making it fun, so we made an app that allows you to continue having fun while keeping up with your language and communication skills! 

The SpeechBuddy App connects the media that you are currently enjoying, and creates tailored questions targeting your communication goals! We’re combining education and entertainment! Meanwhile, you are provided with confidence in knowing that your screen time is being used to practice and improve your knowledge, including session reports to observe your efforts and growth. 

And the best part is, you don’t need to have a speech diagnosis to enjoy the app! Whether you’re a child in Kindergarten or an adult seeking some extra practice, we’ve got you covered!

Download and start your journey to improving language development and unlock your communication potential! 


WHAT TO EXPECT (Premium Users):

📺 An app that connects to any media you’re interested in, such as videos, articles, and games 

🗣️ Choosing speech skills for different areas like:
*Articulation (how you say sounds)
*Phonology (the patterns of sounds you use)
*Expressive Language (how you share your thoughts and ideas)
*Receptive Language (how you understand what others say)
*Fluency (how smoothly you speak)
*Pragmatics (the social rules of talking with others)

🤗 A dashboard that supports up to 4 Buddies (yes, you can share with friends!)

🎧 The ability to complete solo sessions with voice recordings that can be reviewed and analyzed by your speech therapist and/or SpeechBuddy

📈 Adaptive learning using session notes catering to your strengths and weaknesses 

📑 Session summaries and insights for next steps


WAYS TO USE:

﻿- On Weekends 
- For Family Night 
﻿﻿- In the Car 
﻿﻿- During Meal Time
﻿﻿- For Homeschool﻿ing
- Exam Review
- Turning Screen Time into Learning Time 


WHAT PARENTS ARE SAYING ABOUT SPEECHBUDDY:

“If there was a way to play a video game and also work on improving your speech, would you like that? He said yes. 
We are less on top of his speech than we should be… probably like a lot of people…
The possibilities are making me emotional and very enthused. This would be wonderful”
